Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory95.png'}
{3: 'By the time you arrive at the camp, the sky has long turned to night.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: 'Our base is deeper south of the forest.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "But since you said you are going to New Murmansk up north, I've brought you here to our temporary camp.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "Let's spend the night here. I hope you won't mind the simple accommodations.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'Speaking of which, please give me a few minutes...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, Diana goes into the tent and begins preparing something.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Honestly, everything still feels surreal to me.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Really? I think it's been an interesting experience...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "It's just that I've only heard stories about Constructs like them...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Well, if I'm not mistaken, they're outfitted with a rare offshoot of Construct tech—they're humanoid hybrid Constructs.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Humanoid hybrids... Constructs are created with human consciousness. If the bodies are not entirely human, then their consciousness would be...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Correct. In other words, they sacrifice stability with their M.I.N.D. for enhanced combat performance.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Babylonia outlawed such practices because there's no guarantee that the personality of the subject will remain intact.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: 'Gray Ravens, the bonfire is lit.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'This is pine needle tea, unique to this area, and those are...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'Berry cakes made by us, the Forest Guard.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Thanks! Wow... they look delicious...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: '(Good thing we had the commandant take the medicine first.)', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Speaking of, where's your leader?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: 'Rosetta went out on patrol. Corrupted have been growing in numbers throughout the forest lately.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "That's quite out of the ordinary for this area.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'After all, this is a high latitude area, which normally means lower Punishing Virus concentration and, therefore, fewer Corrupted.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Is this the only place you're responsible for guarding?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You mentioned earlier that you were forbidden to enter the port... Why's that?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "It's nothing. It's just... tradition...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Tradition?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Liv's excitement interrupted the awkward silence."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/CgJD04.jpg'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's gorgeous..."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's waving like a ribbon..."}
{3: 'You all look up at the sky, soaking in the rare and magnificent view.'}
{3: 'Even Lee, who normally would throw in a comment at times like this, is just quietly sipping his tea.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'No matter how cruel the battles are on Earth...'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The mountains, the rivers, and the sky above us... They never seem to be affected...'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Earth... is so beautiful...'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "And that's precisely why we are fighting to save it."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "That's right…"}
{3: 'Diana quietly watches the Gray Ravens from the other side of the fire.'}
{3: 'She seems to see some things in them that she has never seen before.'}
{3: 'But peace is a luxury they can no longer afford...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory95.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What was that?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You all immediately put down your teacups. Diana grips her lance vigilantly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "I've picked up a human signal... coming from the north...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'And... Corrupted following in close pursuit!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'That voice is...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Diana raises her front hooves, then immediately charges into the forest.'}
{2: "We'll go with her!", 3: '93'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory87.png'}
{3: 'The sky starts to lighten.'}
{3: 'Deep into the forest, Rosetta stands alone on a clearing near the cliff, staring intently at the slate-blue sea.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Is that so, Derek...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "But... I've already made up my mind...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'New Murmansk is destined to go through this catastrophe...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I hope you can understand my decision...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Why... Derek...? Haven't you always understood?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Why... would you go this far...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta grudgingly bites her lip.'}
{2: 'Nausicaa', 3: 'Chief!'}
{3: 'Hearing the voice behind her, Rosetta collects herself and returns to her usual stoic look.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'M-Miss Rosetta!'}
{3: 'A little boy named Evan stumbles through the snow toward Rosetta.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: 'Last night... he came through the forest all by himself looking for us again...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nausicaa', 3: "Had we not picked up his signal, and if the Gray Ravens didn't help, he'd have been eaten alive by the Corrupted!"}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Evan said he has something he needs to tell you in person...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nausicaa', 3: 'Looks like he just misses you, Chief.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Evan', 3: "I-it's not like that!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Evan', 3: 'Miss Rosetta, I...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Evan', 3: "It's about Derek... He's returning to the port...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "If that's the only reason you're here, you shouldn't have risked your life to tell me in person...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I already knew.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Evan', 3: "But... I think it's different this time. Everyone in the port has been gathering weapons...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Evan', 3: 'There has been a lot more Corrupted lately. The grown-ups are getting nervous...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Evan', 3: 'The navigator at the port found Derek yesterday. People got angry when they heard it was coming back...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Evan', 3: "I'm afraid that...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta turns to face you all.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Then we've got no time to waste. Hop on.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Evan looks a little hesitant, but then bashfully climbs on Rosetta's back with some effort."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I'll lead the way to New Murmansk. Gray Raven...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Just follow my tracks and go at your own pace. Don't overexert yourselves.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "All Forest Guards, stay garrisoned here. Don't go anywhere near the port.", 4: '1'}
